remarks: Commutative/associative law for projective subspace sum.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
paddass.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddass.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
padd12N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( Y .+ ( X .+ Z ) ) ) $.
